content:
Sure, here are some outstanding strategists whose work you could study to help inform your social media strategy:

1. Gary Vaynerchuk - Gary Vaynerchuk, also known as GaryVee, is a highly influential digital marketing expert and founder of VaynerMedia. He is known for his emphasis on creating engaging content that speaks directly to your target audience.
2. Neil Patel - Neil Patel is a digital marketing influencer and founder of Neil Patel Digital. He is recognized for his extensive knowledge of SEO, content marketing, and social media marketing.
3. Jay Baer - Jay Baer is a digital marketing consultant and founder of Convince & Convert. He has been named the #1 content marketer in the world by Content Marketing Institute and is known for his expertise in creating customer-centric social media strategies.
4. Mari Smith - Mari Smith is a social media thought leader and author of "The New Relationship Marketing". She is an expert in Facebook marketing and has been named as one of Forbes' Top Social Media Power Influencers.
5. Matt Navarra - Matt Navarra is a social media consultant and industry commentator. He is highly influential on Twitter and provides valuable insights into the latest social media trends and best practices.
6. Andrew Hutchinson - Andrew Hutchinson is a social media and content marketing expert and the author of "The Ultimate Guide to Social Media for Business Owners, Professionals, and Entrepreneurs". He provides valuable insights on the latest social media trends and best practices.
7. Amy Porterfield - Amy Porterfield is an online marketing strategist and the host of the "Online Marketing Made Easy" podcast. She specializes in helping small business owners and entrepreneurs create successful social media marketing campaigns.

I hope this helps! Good luck with your new social media strategy for 2023.
